phrases: The more I think about Otani's exam tomorrow,
I should send him a message of encouragement...
It is not what you think...
I called around, but no one else could help me.
No need to be so formal.
That is not the problem here...
Do not tell me that is your boyfriend?
Um... I just have one question...
As long as it is not about height.
Are you really okay with someone like this?
Oh dear, oh dear, oh dear.
There is no need to call him.
Koizumi's... I mean... Ri-Ri-Risa's boyfriend, Otani.
Do not go to any trouble!
Yes, I am only just over 156 cm.
Are you really okay with someone like this?
Do not refer to me as this.
Sorry to impose on you like this,
I-It is not what you think!
I do not have any ulterior motive!
The truth is, he has an exam tomorrow,
So it is not what you think.
It is fine, but where will he sleep?
Well, he could sleep in my room...
I mean, I will sleep in a different room...
It is not what you think!
But I seem totally suspicious, do not I?!
What am I doing, ending up like this the day before the exam?!
Doing stuff like this... like this...
I will greet them properly next time.
That is not good enough for me.
You are serious about the strangest things, are not you?
I do not stand for half-heartedness.
But that aside, you should worry about your exam for now.
You will want to study all night, right?
I will go hang out in my brother's room.
If I am with you, I will just end up talking to you.
I do not want to get in the way.
If there is an emergency, just call me.
If it is Otani, he will be fine.
Even if he was chased out of his home the day before his exam,
Would you like something to eat?
But if he sleeps for a bit...
How long does it take to get there?!
If I take the train it takes about an hour.
If I rush now I can still make it!
Why did not you wake me up?!
On TV they said that the trains and buses are not running.
My life has been a mess since I was chased out of my house last night.
There is so much of it, too...
That is how unlucky I am.
All of the other exam students are snowed out too!
It is not like it is just you!
If you have got the time for this, then why not run there?
But the trains are not running...
I will apologize if you die.
But you have worked so hard, Otani.
I do not want to see it go to waste.
It does not matter whether you pass or fail, as long as you do your best!
Do not waste all of your effort up until now!
And then, once today is over, I will say Thanks for all your hard work with a smile.
Otani: I... I have lost all
Otani: I... I have lost all memories
Otani: I... I have lost all memories of
Otani: I... I have lost all memories of my
Otani: I... I have lost all memories of my youth
Otani: I... I have lost all memories of my youth.
That was too loud, you idiot!
It is you, so you will definitely be fine.
The results will be out in a week.
But for now, Otani is free from the stress of studying.
We have not been on a date in ages!
Today I am making it all up to you.
We could not do anything while I was studying,
So you have got the old bag with you?
What are you doing, dressed up like that?
It is a shoot for a magazine.
I am a supermodel, you know.
We are doing an outdoor shoot today.
This is the first time I have seen a photo shoot.
I am going to start shooting.
You over there, you are being disgusting.
I already told you I was.
Are these friends of yours, Mimi-chan?
The old lady is a total stranger.
Say, let us use her in place of the amateur model.
The girl who was going to participate could not make it.
Let us have her fill in.
She is got the height, and she has nice style, do not you think?
No way, no way, no way.
Ah, let us go with a girly look.
Let us go for a really cute look.
For some reason... that person seems really cool.
Come on, let us get on standby.
Um... you over there... could you smile more?
I am not really suited to being a model at all...
I do like watching stuff like this.
Do not get the wrong idea.
That is all thanks to the skills of the stylist.
I love the clothes you pick for me, Nakahara-san.
You are flattering me, but thank you.
It feels great working with you, Nakahara-san.
Do not tell me you want to become a model?
You were way too stiff in front of the camera.
I did think you were cute, though...
I want to become a stylist.
I mean, I do like helping people coordinate clothes and stuff...
Do not worry about whether you are suited to it or not.
Just decide that you like it and want to do it.
Then draw forth your confidence and do it.
Otani-sensei sure is a nice guy.
We went for a drive, and decided to drop by.
I am Risa's lover, and this is her man on the side.
Do not lie to innocent little kids.
I have just been lied to?
Have you been in touch with Otani?
The exam results come out today, right?
Say, I saw the midget earlier.
On the bench in front of the train station.
I called out Hey midget! but he did not respond.
The short boy from the kitchen?
Say, have you talked to Otani?
I have been lied to again, have not I?
I called him several times, but he did not pick up.
He is an idiot, after all.
Laughing at other's misfortunes will bring you bad karma.
If it were me, I would pass first try.
The number you have dialed cannot be reached at this time.
Please leave a message after the tone, then press the pound sign.
How many times do I have to tell you not to scream?
Matsubara-san, I will cover for her.
You can dock my pay if you want!
I was that age once, too.
I will not be lied to any more...
Even if you failed, there is always next year.
I will be right here with you, even if you need to study all year.
Do not run away, you idiot!
It is not the right thing to do.
Who is going to die, you idiot?!
You can retake the test next year.
Why do I have to take it again?
I am telling you, the university accepted me!
But you were looking depressed on the bench in front of the station...
Oh, I was so relieved I feel asleep.
You did not answer your phone.
I just woke up, and I was going to go over to your place.
What is up with you, you idiot!
Falling asleep, running out of batteries...
Do you have any idea how worried I was?!
You are not supposed to make calls while you are at work!
Have not you got anything else to say?
Koizumi, there is no need to cry like that.
If it were not for you, I would not have tried so hard.
So it is thanks to you that I passed.
That is what I was just thinking.
Ah, you really are a worry.
Everyone decided on their future paths.
Soon, we will all go our separate ways.
Even at the very end, I am still running late?!
You are late for your own graduation ceremony.
That is true, is not it?
What are you doing, you idiot?
I would like to say the same to you!
I will say it right back!
You do not need to say it back!
Do you want me to rewrite your diplomas as All Hanshin-Kyojin?
Have you forgotten that you are late?
The valedictorian has come down with anemia.
That is not good at all.
And so, it is my pleasure to introduce...
Those two idiots still are not here...
We have to read the whole thing?
Let us do half and half.
Then you read the first half.
I do not want to start...
These past three years, our teachers have really taken care of us.
It is thanks to them that we have all grown so much.
You do not need to grow any taller, Koizumi.
Well, some of us have remained small.
Still, here at Maido Academy, we have made a lot of good memories,
Some of us are going far away...
Some of us are going to part ways...
We cannot have the comedy act cry.
I am glad I was able to meet you, Otani.
I am glad you are with me, Koizumi.
From now on, we will always be together.
